reporter_caption.center: REED v. LIZ CONSTRUCTION, INC., 522 So.2d 1000 (Fla.App. 3 Dist. 1988)

caption.center: TERRELL REED AND DOROTHY REED, INDIVIDUALLY AND FOR THE USE AND BENEFIT OF
FLORIDA CRANE AND EQUIPMENT RENTAL, INC., APPELLANTS, v. LIZ CONSTRUCTION,
INC. AND SIMS CRANE SERVICES, INC., APPELLEES.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.posture: An Appeal from the Circuit Court for Dade County; Joseph P. Farina, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Max P. Engel and Louis B. Stoskopf, Miami, for appellants.
Richard A. Sherman, Welsh Telander, Joe N. Unger, Miami, for appellees.
opinion.panel: Before BARKDULL, NESBITT and DANIEL S. PEARSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed. Driscoll v. Morris, 114 So.2d 314 (Fla. 3d DCA 1959); Marks v. State Road Dep't, 69 So.2d 771 (Fla. 1954);Thomas v. Lumbermens Mut. Cas. Co., 424 So.2d 36 (Fla. 3d DCA 1982); Powell v. State, 414 So.2d 1095 (Fla. 5th DCA 1982);Fern v. Krantz, 351 So.2d 1144 (Fla. 3d DCA 1977); ReliableServs., Inc. v. Taft, 247 So.2d 97 (Fla. 3d DCA 1971); ยง 59.041, Fla. Stat. (1985).
